name: Space Rush Rider 3D
description:
Finally you are here!
We've been looking for the fastest rider for a long time. It's definitely you!

Ride the neon tracks on extremely fast starships and even cars in the outer space !

In Neon Rush Rider, you'll see something that you've never seen! It's not driving around the city, but real space racing and crazy speed !

*Just take a look:*

- Stunning neon 3D tracks in the deep space and original music
- Choose your ride - some spaceship or a custom space car !
- Insane speed and no brakes on the neon track in outer space !
- Feel the drive and super speed, overcome the fear !
- Big selection of neon tracks !
- Check your reaction !

If you're a racer, who loves neon, cars and high speed, or just looking for a reflex training game, then this survival race is for you!

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS and be the fastest rider!
Enjoy!
